mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memName, memEmail, memPw, memTel, memZipcode, memRoadAddr, memJibunAddr, memDetailAddr) VALUES(#{memName}, #{memEmail}, #{memPw}, #{memTel}, #{memZipcode}, #{memRoadAddr}, #{memJibunAddr}, #{memDetailAddr})
mapper.select: SELECT memNo, memName FROM member WHERE memEmail = #{memEmail} and memPw = #{memPw}
SELECT memEmail FROM member WHERE memName = #{memName} AND memTel = #{memTel}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET memPw = #{memPw}, memTel = #{memTel}, memZipcode = #{memZipcode}, memRoadAddr = #{memRoadAddr}, memJibunAddr = #{memJibunAddr}, memDetailAddr = #{memDetailAddr}
